disableParam_NT.Wiki: Parameters marked with are excluded in the NT version package.

properPortraitId.Wiki: The in-game looking portrait to use for this character.

simplePortraitId.Wiki: The simple icon portrait to use for this character.

characterUnlockFlag.Wiki: The flag that must be ON for this character to be unlocked.

characterSkillTitleId.Wiki: The title of the character skill for this character.

characterSkillSummaryId.Wiki: The summary of the character skill for this character.

characterSkillIconId.Wiki: The icon ID for the character skill.

ultimateArtTitleId.Wiki: The title of the ultimate art for this character.

ultimateArtSummaryId.Wiki: The summary of the ultimate art for this character.

ultimateArtIconId.Wiki: The icon ID for the ultimate art.

backgroundDescriptionId.Wiki: The background description for this character.

ultimateArtCharge.Wiki: Amount of ultimate charge required to perform ultimate art

characterAbilityUsageCount.Wiki: The maximum number of uses that can be stored for the character skill.

passiveAbilityTitleId.Wiki: The title of the passive ability for this character.

passiveAbilitySummaryId.Wiki: The summary of the passive ability for this character.

passiveAbilityIconId.Wiki: The icon ID for the passive ability.

smallHudIconId.Wiki: The icon ID for the a small HUD element.

characterSkillDescriptionId.Wiki: The description of the character skill for this character.

ultimateArtDescriptionId.Wiki: The description of the ultimate art for this character.

passiveAbilityDescriptionId.Wiki: The description of the passive ability for this character.

Option.Name: Raider - Great Hammer / Greataxe / Colossal Weapon
